attr.title: LOVE 3
attr.desc:
LOVE 3 is a precision platformer with minimalistic pixel graphics and tight controls. Face challenging obstacles, discover hidden secrets, and place custom checkpoints after you overcome each new danger.

3 Other games included for free:
Includes every level from LOVE, LOVE 2: kuso, and LOVE Remastered, in addition to the original 42 track soundtrack.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on Itch. Fred Wood has kindly provided a PortMaster package, download it. This will replace the gamedata folder in your portfolder.

If you already own the game on Steam. You will need to download the Linux version. If you're running windows, use this command in the Steam Console: download_depot 1604300 1604302 2416319664696347085. Locate the gamefiles and copy over the assets to the gamedata folder.
